attributes.action: Force the Tees Valley JSU to include Hartlepool in the first phase of the planned Metro
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Force the Tees Valley JSU and Durham/Tees Valley local auhtorities to include Hartlepool into the first phase of the planned Tees Valley Metro system and making Hartlepool an interchange point between Tees Valley and Tyne and Wear.
